articles.title: India tells Quad will allow export of 8 million Indo-Pacific vaccine doses - CNBCTV18
articles.description: A plan reached by the Quad earlier this year to supply a billion COVID-19 shots across Asia by the end of 2022 stalled after India, the world’s largest vaccine producer, banned exports in April amid a massive COVID outbreak at home.

articles.title: Asian stock markets wobble as China Evergrande woes sap confidence - The Star Online
